policies.title: Our Policies
policies.subtitle: Privacy & Data Usage
policies.p1: Your privacy is important to us. This application operates entirely on the client-side. All data, including your API keys and wallet information, is stored locally in your browser's storage and is never sent to any server.
policies.p2: We do not collect, store, or process any personal information. Your trading activity is simulated and remains private to your session.
policies.p3: The AI analysis feature sends anonymized market data (like price, volume, and RSI) to the Google Gemini API to generate signals, but it does not include any of your personal or wallet information.
